titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Isaac W. Scott
CWG13649

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 8; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Isaac W. Scott Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered as Surgeon General of Kentucky actively engaged in visiting the various Kentucky Regiments and military hospitals looking after the Sanitary condition and ministering to the wants of Kentucky soldiers now in the Service of the U. States for 10 mos at $150 per month

body.p: The Quarter Master General of Ky will pay the above account out of the Military Fund

Tho E Bramlette Govr
Gov of Ky
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 23d of June, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Fifteen Hundred Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 95 Abstract B G Qr. 186
I. W. Scott
Dollars 1500.00/100
Paid Jun 23, 1864
